001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import androidx.room.Room;
005import androidx.room.RoomDatabase;
006import dagger.Module;
007import dagger.Provides;
008import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
009import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
010import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.dao.GameResultDao;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.dao.UserDao;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service.CodebreakerDatabase;
014import javax.inject.Singleton;
015
016@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
017@Module
018public class CodebreakerDatabaseModule {
019
020  CodebreakerDatabaseModule() {
021    // Avoid javadoc HTML generation
022  }
023
024  @Provides
025  @Singleton
026  public CodebreakerDatabase provideDatabase(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
027    return Room.databaseBuilder(context, CodebreakerDatabase.class, CodebreakerDatabase.NAME)
028        .addCallback(new CodebreakerDatabase.Callback())
029        .build();
030  }
031
032  @Provides
033  @Singleton
034  public GameResultDao provideResultsDao(CodebreakerDatabase database) {
035    return database.getGameResultDao();
036  }
037
038  @Provides
039  @Singleton
040  public UserDao provideUserDao(CodebreakerDatabase database){
041    return database.getUserDao();
042  }
043}
